about_the_game:
In "Nightmare Owl," step into the haunting first-person horror world of Chrissy, who is trapped in a nightmare she cannot escape. After discovering a satanic book on her family’s old farm, she becomes ensnared in a terrifying dreamscape where demons relentlessly hunt her. The only hope for survival lies in finding the elusive owl, a mysterious guide that holds the key to escaping this dark and twisted realm.

As you navigate the eerie remnants of the farm, you must outwit and outrun the demonic forces that lurk in the shadows. With nothing but a flashlight to light your way, you’ll uncover riddles, search for hidden clues, and use whatever means necessary to survive the night. But beware—each step brings you closer to danger, and only the owl can show you the path to freedom.

Will you have the courage to face your fears and break the nightmare’s grip, or will you be trapped in the darkness forever?

This description sets the stage for a tense and atmospheric horror experience, focusing on the girl’s struggle to escape the nightmare.

FIND MELEE WEAPONS

---------------------

Use weapons to break objects or defend yourself from demons.

Be careful, the demons attack very fast!

GET TO THE FLASHLIGHT FAST!

----------------------

You will be in the dark most of the time so the flashlight is needed!

The Flashlight is usually close to you when you enter the nightmare.

FIND THE OWL

----------------------

Find the owl with the flashlight to be directed through

the nightmare.

USE THE FLASHLIGHT UV

----------------------

The flashlight has UV abilities which kill demons within

the nightmare.

FIND THE RIDDLES

---------------------

Figuring out riddles will help you find the owl.

FIND HIDING PLACES

---------------------

Find places to hide if you are cornered by demons.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features blood effects when attacking enemies. Before each level, the main character is depicted in bed, dreaming, wearing a top and underwear.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX745 2 GB GDDR5 Or AMD Radeon R9 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz or better dual-core (or quad-core) CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB GDDR5 Or AMD Radeon RX 570 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: "Nightmare Owl" is a first-person horror game where Chrissy, trapped by a satanic book, is hunted by demons on her family’s farm. Her only hope is finding a mysterious owl. Use your flashlight, wits, and stealth to survive, solve puzzles, and escape the nightmare.
